tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Project (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, project_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Contractor (contractor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, contractor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, contractor_license VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Task (task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, task_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE Project (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE Contractor (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), license_number VARCHAR(50), contact_person VARCHAR(255), contact_number VARCHAR(15)
CREATE TABLE Material (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), type VARCHAR(50), quantity INT, unit_of_measure VARCHAR(20)
CREATE TABLE Task (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT, status VARCHAR(20), project_id INT)
Construction Project (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(50), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, budget DECIMAL)
Contractor (contractor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, contractor_name VARCHAR(50), contact_number VARCHAR(20), email VARCHAR(50))
Worker (worker_id INT PRIMARY KEY, worker_name VARCHAR(50), speciality VARCHAR(50), experience_years INT)
Materials (material_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_name VARCHAR(50), quantity INT, supplier VARCHAR(50))
Progress (project_id INT, date DATE, completed BOOLEAN, progress_notes TEXT)
